37.title: Sell  Latency (Avg)
37.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell"
| filter isNotNull(Duration)
| summarize SellLatencyAvg = round(avg(Duration),decimals:2)
| fields Status = concat((SellLatencyAvg)," ms ")

38.title: Buy Latency (Avg)

| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy"
| filter isNotNull(Duration)
| summarize BuyLatencyAvg = round(avg(Duration),decimals:2)
| fields Status = concat((BuyLatencyAvg)," ms ")

| summarize SellTradeVolumeAvg =  avg((Amount)*(Price))

45.title: Latency (Avg)
45.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell"
| filter isNotNull(Duration)
| parse event.type, "'com.easytrade.long-' STRING:tradeType"
| makeTimeseries ResponseTimeAvg = avg(Duration), by:{tradeType}

46.title: Volume by TradeType  (Avg)
46.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell"
| filter isNotNull(Amount)
| parse event.type, "'com.easytrade.long-' STRING:tradeType"
| fieldsAdd totalTradeAmount = (Amount)*(Price)
| makeTimeseries TradeVolumeAvg = avg(totalTradeAmount), by:{tradeType}

47.title: Volume by TradeType (Total)

| filter isNotNull(Amount)
| parse event.type, "'com.easytrade.long-' STRING:tradeType"
| fieldsAdd totalTradeAmount = (Amount)*(Price)
| makeTimeseries TradeVolume = Sum(totalTradeAmount), by:{tradeType}

| filter isNotNull(Amount)
| parse event.type, "'com.easytrade.long-' STRING:tradeType"
| makeTimeseries totalTrades = count(), by:{tradeType}

49.title: Top Trade Dollar Volume by Account ID

50.title: Top Trade Volume by Account ID

51.title: Top increase in value by Account ID
51.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "www.easytrade.com"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.withdraw" or event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit"
| fieldsAdd amount_withdrawal = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.withdraw", toDouble(Amount), else:0.0)
| fieldsAdd amount_deposit = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.deposit", toDouble(Amount), else:0.0)
| summarize {total_withdrawals = sum(amount_withdrawal), total_deposits = sum(amount_deposit)}, by:{`Account ID`}
| fieldsAdd BalanceChange = round(total_deposits - total_withdrawals,decimals:2)
| filter BalanceChange > 0.0
| fields `Account ID`, BalanceChange
| sort BalanceChange, direction:"descending"
| limit 5

52.title: Buy SLA status
52.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" 
| filter isNotNull(Duration)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(Duration > 23, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| summarize slaPercentage=round(toDouble(countIf(sla == "Met"))/toDouble(Count()) * 100,decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd slaStatus = if(slaPercentage <= 95, "NotMet ‚ùå ", else:"Met ‚úÖ ")
| fields Status = concat((slaPercentage), "% ", (slaStatus))

53.title: Sell SLA status
53.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell"
| filter isNotNull(Duration)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(Duration > 23, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| summarize slaPercentage=round(toDouble(countIf(sla == "Met"))/toDouble(Count()) * 100,decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd slaStatus = if(slaPercentage <= 95, "NotMet ‚ùå ", else:"Met ‚úÖ ")
| fields Status = concat((slaPercentage), "% ", (slaStatus))

54.title: Top decrease in value by Account ID
54.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "www.easytrade.com"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.withdraw" or event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit"
| fieldsAdd amount_withdrawal = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.withdraw", toDouble(Amount), else:0.0)
| fieldsAdd amount_deposit = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.deposit", toDouble(Amount), else:0.0)
| summarize {total_withdrawals = sum(amount_withdrawal), total_deposits = sum(amount_deposit)}, by:{`Account ID`}
| fieldsAdd BalanceChange = round(total_deposits - total_withdrawals,decimals:2)
| filter BalanceChange < 0.0
| fields `Account ID`, BalanceChange
| sort BalanceChange, direction:"ascending"
| limit 5

55.title: Buy SLA status
55.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy"
| filter isNotNull(Duration)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(Duration > 23, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| makeTimeseries  Met = countIf(sla == "Met"), notMet = countIf(sla == "NotMet")

56.title: Time from deposit to first Sell
56.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "www.easytrade.com"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" OR event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit"
| fieldsAdd deposit_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_asset_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell", toLong(timestamp))
| summarize first_deposit_ts = takeFirst(deposit_ts), first_sell_asset_ts = takeFirst(sell_asset_ts), by:{`Account ID`}
| fieldsAdd time_from_deposit_to_first_sell = (first_sell_asset_ts - first_deposit_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| filter time_from_deposit_to_first_sell > 5
| limit 5
| fields `Account ID`, time_from_deposit_to_first_sell, alias:{Seconds} 
| sort Seconds desc

57.title: Most recent trades
57.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter (event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" OR event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell")
| filter isNotNull(Amount)
| filterOut isNull(trace_id)
| parse event.type, "'com.easytrade.long-' STRING:TradeType"
| fieldsAdd sla = if(Duration > 23, "üî¥", else: "üü¢")
| fields {timestamp, alias:Time}, `Account ID`, TradeType, Amount, Price, TotalVolume = round(Amount * Price, decimals:2),trace_id
| sort Time,  direction:"descending"
| limit 5

58.title: Sell SLA status
58.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell"
| filter isNotNull(Duration)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(Duration > 23, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| makeTimeseries  Met = countIf(sla == "Met"), notMet = countIf(sla == "NotMet")
